account: P / The Om Spa | Account-01 / USD [OWN]

keyInsights.insight: $720 spent on 146 zero-conversion search terms (76% of visible spend).
Only 44% Search Impression Share — missing 56% of eligible searches.

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 6 conversion actions (1x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x PURCHASE, 1x DEFAULT, 1x CONTACT, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 1x STORE_VISIT). Recording 192 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Not enabled. With 192 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 6 conversion categories: 1x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x PURCHASE, 1x DEFAULT, 1x CONTACT, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 1x STORE_VISIT.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Potential duplicates: 3x "call" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: GA4 conversion actions linked — enables cross-device tracking and richer audience data.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 6 actions recording 192 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $720 spent on 146 zero-conversion search terms (76% of $947 visible search spend). Top waste: "prenatal massage" $70, "naples spa" $59, "massage naples fl" $39, "acupuncture naples fl" $31, "lymphatic drainage massage" $31.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: 2 list(s) with 269 total negatives. Add themed lists (Competitors, Job Seekers, Irrelevant) — minimum 3 for proper filtering.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: 269 negative keywords across 2 lists. Ensure lists are attached to all active campaigns.

checks.name: Broad match performance
checks.finding: Broad match: $1,270 spend, 23.2 conv, $55 CPA. Exact: $0 spend, 0 conv.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: 2 keywords spent $114 with 0 conversions in 30d. Top waste: "pregnancy massage near me" $81, "hydrafacial near me" $33.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 2 naming prefix(es) across 4 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 3 ad groups across 4 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 4 campaigns: 2 SEARCH, 2 PERFORMANCE_MAX.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: PMax active — cross-channel reach across Search, Display, YouTube, Gmail, Maps, Discover.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: Both Search and PMax active — PMax takes priority for exact match queries. Use brand exclusions in PMax and monitor cannibalization.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 4 campaigns, $611/day budget, 44% Search Impression Share. Top: Performance Max - OmSpa (1.33x ROAS, $12,814).

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $611/day budget, ~$648/day actual spend (106% utilization).

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: Correctly using "Presence" targeting.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 5.0/10 across 11 scored keywords (2 at 7+, 3 below 5). Est. CPC premium from low-QS keywords: ~$7/month. Top offenders: "naples day spa" QS 3 ($23 spend, ~$7 premium).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 636 of 1032 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d. These are too restrictive, low-volume, or outranked — review and pause dead keywords.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 5.0 indicates poor keyword-to-ad relevance. Tighten ad group themes and include keywords in headlines.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: 10 RSAs: 1 Good/Excellent, 9 need improvement (1 GOOD, 3 AVERAGE, 6 POOR).

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: 2 PMax campaign(s). Performance Max - OmSpa: $12,814 spend, 1.33x ROAS, $96 CPA, 133.5 conv. Performance Max - OmSpa - Desktop Only: $5,369 spend, 1.4x ROAS, $153 CPA, 35.1 conv.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 4.35%. Strong CTR.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Smart bidding active: TARGET_SPEND, MAXIMIZE_CONVERSION_VALUE, MAXIMIZE_CONVERSIONS.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 44% Search Impression Share — missing 56% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: Using automated bidding.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 43 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 12 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 2 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 116 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: 1 call asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 1 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: No Customer Match lists. Upload CRM emails/phones for lookalike targeting and customer exclusion.

quickWins.action: Add negatives for 10 zero-conversion search terms: "prenatal massage", "naples spa", "massage naples fl"... — $720 wasted.
Pause 2 zero-conversion keywords: "pregnancy massage near me", "hydrafacial near me" — $114 wasted.
Fix: Server-side tracking — No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.
Fix: Brand campaign — No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.
Fix: Customer Match — No Customer Match lists. Upload CRM emails/phones for lookalike targeting and customer exclusion.

items: $720 wasted on 146 zero-conversion search terms. Add top wasters as negatives: "prenatal massage", "naples spa", "massage naples fl", "acupuncture naples fl", "lymphatic drainage massage".
Create a brand Search campaign to protect branded terms from competitors.
Build remarketing audiences (all visitors 30d, cart abandoners, converters) and upload Customer Match lists from CRM.
Pause or restructure 2 zero-conversion keywords to recover $114/month.
Increase Search Impression Share from 44% — you're missing 56% of potential customers.
With 192 conversions/month, test Demand Gen or Display remarketing for upper-funnel growth.
